solution_line_template: Alfonso has to work for the ${helmet_cost} - ${current_savings} = $<<{remaining_amount_needed}={remaining_amount_needed}>>{remaining_amount_needed}.
In a week, he earns ${daily_earnings} x {days_worked_per_week} = $<<{daily_earnings}*{days_worked_per_week}={weekly_earnings}>>{weekly_earnings}.
Thus, he needs to work ${remaining_amount_needed}/${weekly_earnings} = <<{remaining_amount_needed}/{weekly_earnings}={weeks_to_work}>>{weeks_to_work} weeks to buy the bike.
